verses.verse: Better <S%H2896><s%> is the poor <S%H7326><s%> that walketh <S%H1980><s%> in his integrity <S%H8537><s%> Than he that is perverse <S%H6141><s%> in his lips <S%H8193><s%> and is a fool <S%H3684><s%>.
Also <S%H5315><s%>, that the soul be without knowledge <S%H1847><s%> is not good <S%H2896><s%>; And he that hasteth <S%H213><s%> with his feet <S%H7272><s%> sinneth <S%H2398><s%>.
The foolishness <S%H200><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> subverteth <S%H5557><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>; And his heart <S%H3820><s%> fretteth <S%H2196><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> addeth <S%H3254><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> friends <S%H7453><s%>; But the poor <S%H1800><s%> is separated <S%H6504><s%> from his friend <S%H7453><s%>.
A false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not be unpunished <S%H5352><s%>; And he that uttereth <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> shall not escape <S%H4422><s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> will entreat <S%H2470><s%> the favor <S%H6440><s%> of the liberal <S%H5081><s%> man <S%H7453><s%>; And every man is a friend to him <S%H376><s%> that giveth gifts <S%H4976><s%>.

All the brethren <S%H251><s%> of the poor <S%H7326><s%> do hate <S%H8130><s%> him <S%H4828><s%>: How much more do his friends go far <S%H7368><s%> from him <S%H7291><s%>! He pursueth them with words <S%H561><s%>, but they are gone.

He that getteth <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H3820><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> his own soul <S%H5315><s%>: He that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> understanding <S%H8394><s%> shall find <S%H4672><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>.
A false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not be unpunished <S%H5352><s%>; And he that uttereth <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>.
Delicate <S%H8588><s%> living is not seemly <S%H5000><s%> for a fool <S%H3684><s%>; Much less for a servant <S%H5650><s%> to have rule <S%H4910><s%> over princes <S%H8269><s%>.
The discretion <S%H7922><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> maketh him slow <S%H748><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>; And it is his glory <S%H8597><s%> to pass over <S%H5674><s%> a transgression <S%H6588><s%>.
The king <S%H4428><s%>'s wrath <S%H2197><s%> is as the roaring <S%H5099><s%> of a lion <S%H3715><s%>; But his favor <S%H7522><s%> is as dew <S%H2919><s%> upon the grass <S%H6212><s%>.

A foolish <S%H3684><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> is the calamity <S%H1942><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>; And the contentions <S%H4079><s%> of a wife <S%H802><s%> are a continual <S%H2956><s%> dropping <S%H1812><s%>.
House <S%H1004><s%> and riches <S%H1952><s%> are an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> from fathers <S%H1><s%>; But a prudent <S%H7919><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> is from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Slothfulness <S%H6103><s%> casteth <S%H5307><s%> into a deep sleep <S%H8639><s%>; And the idle <S%H7423><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall suffer hunger <S%H7456><s%>.
He that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> keepeth <S%H8104><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>; But he that is careless <S%H959><s%> of his ways <S%H1870><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%>.
He that hath pity <S%H2603><s%> upon the poor <S%H1800><s%> lendeth <S%H3867><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And his good deed <S%H1576><s%> will he pay him again <S%H7999><s%>.
Chasten <S%H3256><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%>, seeing there is <S%H3426><s%> hope <S%H8615><s%>; And set not thy <S%H5315><s%> heart <S%H5375><s%> on his destruction <S%H4191><s%>.
A man <S%H1419><s%> of great <S%H1632><s%> wrath <S%H2534><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the penalty <S%H6066><s%>; For if thou deliver <S%H5337><s%> him <S%H3254><s%>, thou must do it yet again.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%>, and receive <S%H6901><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>, That thou mayest be wise <S%H2449><s%> in thy latter end <S%H319><s%>.
There are many <S%H7227><s%> devices <S%H4284><s%> in a man <S%H376><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%>; But the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that shall stand <S%H6965><s%>.
That which maketh a man <S%H120><s%> to be desired <S%H8378><s%> is his kindness <S%H2617><s%>; And a poor man <S%H7326><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H376><s%> a liar <S%H3577><s%>.

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> tendeth to life <S%H2416><s%>; And he that hath it shall abide <S%H3885><s%> satisfied <S%H7649><s%>; He shall not be visited <S%H6485><s%> with evil <S%H7451><s%>.
The sluggard <S%H6102><s%> burieth <S%H2934><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> in the dish <S%H6747><s%>, And will not so much as bring <S%H7725><s%> it to his mouth <S%H6310><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>.

Smite <S%H5221><s%> a scoffer <S%H3887><s%>, and the simple <S%H6612><s%> will learn prudence <S%H6191><s%>; And reprove <S%H3198><s%> one that hath understanding <S%H995><s%>, and he will understand <S%H995><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.

He that doeth <S%H7703><s%> violence to his father <S%H1><s%>, and chaseth away <S%H1272><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>, Is a son <S%H1121><s%> that causeth shame <S%H954><s%> and bringeth reproach <S%H2659><s%>.
Cease <S%H2308><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>, to hear <S%H8085><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> Only to err <S%H7686><s%> from the words <S%H561><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.

A worthless <S%H1100><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> mocketh <S%H3887><s%> at justice <S%H4941><s%>; And the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> swalloweth <S%H1104><s%> iniquity <S%H7563><s%>.
Judgments <S%H8201><s%> are prepared <S%H3559><s%> for scoffers <S%H3887><s%>, And stripes <S%H4112><s%> for the back <S%H1460><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%>.
